definition: to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: This being looks at her with a hypnotically deep and steady gaze, as if penetrating her with its eyes.
sentences.chinese: 天使如催眠般深深凝望着她，仿佛要用目光将她穿透。

sentences.english: David and Lucy sat in the prow of the fishing boat and looked across the choppy water.
sentences.chinese: 大卫和露西坐在渔船船头，凝望着烟波浩淼的水面。

sentences.english: And Marathon looks on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 马拉松凝望着海涛汹汹。

sentences.english: Like the long river of years at the shore you soft.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢在岁月的长河里凝望彼岸你柔和的倩影。

sentences.english: They were in the saloon of a sinking ship, looking up at him through the darkening water.
sentences.chinese: 她们困在沉船客舱里，透过发暗的水体凝望他。

sentences.english: You quickly forget about that beautiful guy you kept locking eyes with in the cappuccino line.
sentences.chinese: 你很快忘了买咖啡排队时让你痴痴凝望的漂亮男人。

sentences.english: So take advantage of the moonless skies in the evenings this week, and go stargazing.
sentences.chinese: 所以在这个星期，抓住没有月亮的夜晚，去凝望星空。

sentences.english: A great divide but this man held my gaze across the distance.
sentences.chinese: 人群分割了我们，但那个男人夺走了我的凝望。

sentences.english: But when I sleep, in dreams they look on thee.
sentences.chinese: 而当我入睡，梦中却向你凝望。

sentences.english: Watching Chang Chen stare off into the falls made me think of Happy Together.
sentences.chinese: 看著张震凝望瀑布的样子，我想起了《春光乍泄》。

sentences.english: She gazed in fear and amazement.
sentences.chinese: 她用惧怕和骇怪的目光凝望着。

sentences.english: She stared at him, her mascara smeared, tears upon her cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 她凝望着他，睫毛膏模糊在眼角，脸颊上有泪。

sentences.english: A lonely empty chamber, with a window at.
He stood on the lookout tower and gazzed into the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 他站在探望塔上，向荒野里凝望。

sentences.english: He was gazing upward to the gleaming pyramid of Karakal.
sentences.chinese: 他凝望着卡拉卡尔那闪光的金字塔般的山峰。

sentences.english: We gazed at the majesty of the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我们凝望着雄伟的山脉。

definition: to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to stand for a long time
to survey the scene from an elevated position
to look up at/to look up to sb hopefully
to raise one's head and look into the distance/fig. to forward to/to long for
